name: GOLDAK
description:
Defeat the GOLDAK in this Platform / puzzle 3D action game. You are E´et , an Extradimensional Solver, a "SPIE". Lost into dangerous dimensional spaces, after eons on cosmic coma, you are a prisoner and must find answers to scape from Goldak domains.

FOLLOW US LIVE at TWITCH.TV:  https://www.twitch.tv/starpalmgames

Follow us on Twitter:  @starpalmgames

YouTube Channel

Discord: https://discord.gg/RmC9Yfn

Other ways to support us is to get your own awesome T-shirts and Wall Art posters here: https://society6.com/starpalmgames

"When I woke up, I realized quickly that I had made a mistake. During my coma, I was mysteriously brought into the final frontier of the universe, called Goldak. "

"A place for lost consciousness and traitors of the cosmos laws. I do not know how i came here."

"Transformed into a sphere by Goldak I must solve the darkest challenges, all I have left is to escape and be free, who knows. The return to the cosmic wheel was inevitable .. "

Minimum hardware  requirements:

Processor: 1,4 GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB 1600 MHz DDR3 Graphics:  Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB or better
